name: Synology Surveillance Station Download File
summary: An SVSDOWNLOAD file is a temporary file created by Synology Surveillance Station when downloading a recording. It is a placeholder for the downloading recording, similar to a .CRDOWNLOAD file, that Surveillance Station replaces with a video file once the download is complete. Typically, a user will not encounter an SVSDOWNLOAD file unless the download is interrupted.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
